spec_data.Name: malaga-suomi-voikko
spec_data.Description:
A description of Finnish morphology written in Malaga. This package is built
to support the Voikko spellchecker/hyphenator, it doesn't support the Sukija
text indexer.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 04:14:32 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A description of Finnish morphology written in Malaga (Voikko edition)
